title: Sunset Waves
description: Soft orange and pink bands that feel like the last light over the ocean.

title: City Static
description: Bright blocks of color stacked like noisy city buildings at night.

title: Quiet Corners
description: A soft blue portrait focusing on light and shadow instead of details.

title: Neon Paths
description: Glowing lines that twist and cross, like roads in a digital map.

title: Forest Echo
description: Layers of green that suggest trees without fully drawing them.

title: Midnight Mirror
description: Dark blues and greys that look like reflections in a nighttime window.
